metadata.title: CVE-2020-15661 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A rogue webpage could override the injected WKUserScript used by the loginsautofill, this exploit could result in leaking a password for the currentdomain. This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 28.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
